snippet: The former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi has petitioned to serve his tax fraud sentence by doing community service, and Italy is abuzz with speculation, serious and otherwise, on what he might do.
abstract: Silvio Berlusconi petitions Rome court to let him serve his one-year sentence for tax fraud conviction by doing community service; Italian citizens speculate about what tasks the once powerful former prime minister will be assigned to.
lead_paragraph: The former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi has petitioned to serve his tax fraud sentence by doing community service, and Italy is abuzz with speculation, serious and otherwise, on what he might do.

headline.main: Berlusconi Aiding War Victims? Italy Speculates on His Penance
headline.print_headline: Berlusconi Aiding War Victims? Italy Speculates on His Penance
